Text:
I love having the audio edition of The Economist...thank you so very much for it!
=)

Thankyou very much      rambam1776 VIP. . Your  upload  is highly appreciated. It has  infact become a part of my life... So looking  sincerely  forward for your  weekly updates of the  MP3 version of The Economist. may  be  sometime  when I  am well enough to purchase  a copy  of it  I will  but  until then  we  just relay on your  Merci. Thankfully.
